survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from attendees of professional networking events to improve future event planning and attendee satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall organization of the networking event?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for better granularity in responses.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall organization of the networking event?

questions.question_text: Which of the following aspects of the event did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following aspects of the event did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How many meaningful professional connections did you make during the event?
questions.client_notes: Provide predefined ranges for easier quantification.

script.question_text: How many meaningful professional connections did you make during the event?

questions.question_text: What suggestions do you have for improving future networking events?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What suggestions do you have for improving future networking events?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this event to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/maybe question to gauge net promoter score (NPS) potential.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this event to a colleague?
